item.title: Java - removing leading zeroes from a string
item.description: Using Regular Expressions (regex) String str = "00938"; System.out.println("*" + str.replaceFirst("^0+", "") + "*"); //*938* Suppose the string contains only zeroes, then the output will be a null string.
